author: jonl
msg: Added overloads of static package resource binding methods which don't require null arguments, then simplified the pub example.

author: jonl
msg: Removed old static map variable from PackageResource.  This was wrong and would cause bugs in PackageResources in multiple applications with the same path and scope but different resource values since they would collide.  The new implementation is far simpler and puts the resource into the SharedResources object for the application.

author: jonl
msg: Made resourceKey(Application, Class scope, String path, Locale, String style) non static and removed unneeded Application parameter.

author: ehillenius
msg: renamed IAuthorizationStrategy methods to reflect that authorization is queried instead of applied
